Description.data:
Hoodies are a wardrobe essential and this one looks as good as it feels while nailing off-duty style! The Waffle Hoodie comes in a neutral shade of grey, just like those graphics cards you've been drooling over. It's not too baggy or too saggy, and it's made of organic cotton with a dash of spandex to make it a little roomy, ensuring the perfect fit.
It's like a warm hug that you can wear! Making this the perfect addition to your hoodie rotation, because we all know you can't own just one. It also comes equipped with pockets big enough to hold your secret stash of USB thumb drives and those random screws you never know what to do with.
Note: This hoodie does not guarantee to give you the ability to fix your computer by wearing it, but it will take your comfort to unprecedented heights. Handle with care and wear responsibly.

Description.data:
The best button-up shirts take all the guesswork out of getting dressed. Our long sleeve button-up shirt is the perfect blend of casual and clever! Made with 96% cotton and 4% elastane, it's comfy enough to swaddle up in on weekends and versatile enough for dinner with the parents.
Whether you're feeling dapper in dark blue or chill in light charcoal grey, the next time you’re standing in front of your closet panic-picking a half presentable fit, take a deep breath, grab this button-up, and exhale slowly. We got you.

Description.data:
Introducing the Fleece Lined Shacket: the ultimate “shirt meets jacket” hybrid that will leave you wondering why you’ve been wearing regular shirts and jackets separately all these years. Picture this: you're snuggled up in a warm fleece lining, feeling as cozy as a marshmallow in a cup of hot chocolate. Meanwhile, the outer layer is all like, "I'm here to make you look cool, baby!". The premium fabric and clever design combines the best of both worlds.
Whether you’re on a casual stroll, battling office air conditioning, or pretending to be an undercover superhero, you can throw this on without a single thought and still look good. Say goodbye to the eternal dilemma of shirt or jacket!

Description.data:
Crafted from a blend of 96% cotton and 4% elastane, this shirt is softer than a freshly-pixellated kitten's fur. It's so comfortable, you'll forget you're wearing anything at all—well, except for the constant compliments and envious stares you'll receive. Available in charcoal or green, choose the shade that best matches you or switch between them for a wardrobe that's as versatile as a Swiss Army knife.
Whether you're conquering the world of coding, attending a high-stakes LAN party, or simply impressing your in-laws with your impeccable taste, this polo is your secret weapon. Prepare to leave a trail of jaw-dropped onlookers in your wake!

Description.data:
Are you tired of sacrificing comfort and function for fashion? Yearning for pants that won't judge you during your late-night snack sessions? Crafted with care and a touch of tech elegance, the LTT Premium Joggers are the epitome of versatility. Coming in neutral tones to go with everything, like timeless black and adventurous olive. And with the option of standard or long length, you can find the perfect fit for your legs of any length.
Made with 100% recycled polyester, they're not just fashion-forward; they're eco-friendly too! But comfort is where these joggers truly shine. Stay fresh and cozy, even during an intense gaming session. Worried about storing your essentials while on the go? Fear not! They come equipped with pockets designed to hold all your treasures. From your trusty smartphone to your top-secret stash of snacks.
Warning: Wearing these joggers may lead to sudden outbursts of confidence, impromptu dance-offs in the grocery store, and maybe an uncontrollable God complex. Embrace your newfound powers responsibly and remember to stretch before attempting any parkour.

Description.data:
Stay dry - and stylish - with the LTT Windbreaker.
With fully sealed seams, a 10,000mm-rated water resistant dual-layer membrane, and YKK AquaSeal® zippers on the 3 exterior pockets, this white and black color-blocked jacket is a perfect outer layer for rainy days.
We added drawcord adjustments to the hood to ensure that you can find balance between rain coverage and visibility, and included some reflective elements on the front and back of the jacket.
And last but not least, we added venting with an inner mesh on the back and underarms to provide some extra breathability where it matters most!

SAY GOODBYE TO CAGE NUTS - Meet the NEW revolutionary DUO, the 1RU rack mount technology that is a universal replacement for cage nuts. Rack your 1RU 19” gear 50% faster with Rackstuds DUO
SIMPLE & EASY INSTALLATION: Rackstuds install from the front for easy installation, and provide support during install to make single-handed installs possible. Simply clip in the Duo, hang your gear, and spin on the nuts - job done in less than 30 seconds!
STRONG & SAFE: In addition to its simple installation, Rackstuds can withstand shearing forces of over 400 pounds. Rackstuds are safe, won’t scratch your equipment, and don’t pose an electrical hazard. No more fiddling with cage nuts!
THE GO-TO CHOICE FOR DATA CENTERS WORLDWIDE: With over 1.5 million units sold, the Rackstuds Series II builds on this reputation and is now stronger and faster to insert, with longer threads and improved leverage strength - over 30% stronger than the previous series.
READY TO STREAMLINE YOUR SYSADMIN GAME? Say goodbye to cage nuts and say hello to the Rackstuds Series II DUO.

Description.data:
Lightweight, breathable, AND insulating?? The LTT 3D Down Jacket has it all.
The cornerstone feature here is an 11-layer fabric which features goose down fibers in the middle layer. The down is included to provide its classic, fantastic heat insulation. The 3D printing machines used in the creation of this fabric arrange the down fibers in a "cobweb" pattern, which allows room between the fibers for increased airflow and breathability.
The process of creating this fabric is a bit different than what you'd find in a standard extrusion-based plastic printer, but it shares some of the underlying principles as an additive process which "deposits" the fibers rather than weaving them.
Utilizing a blend of nylon and spandex, the outer layer of the jacket provides enough stretch to remain comfortable in active use, as well as some water resistance in rain or snow (greater than 1800mm water resistance in our testing).
And of course, no LTT garment would be complete without YKK zippers, as well as an array of pockets - 3 exterior zippered pockets, 1 interior zippered pocket, and 1 interior sleeve pocket.
To top it all off, we added a beaded heat transfer print with an LTT logo on the right hip, as well as a small printed strip under the rear neck.

Description.data:
The perfect accessory for the LTT Backpack, and for travelers of all types.
Utilizing the same water resistant fabric found on the LTT Backpack, our Tech Sack is meant to keep your small items organized in transit, whether those are cables, tools, toiletries, or cosmetics. It includes 8 internal sleeves for tech or other small items to keep things organized and separated, as well as water resistant YKK zippers to ensure a quality seal and feel. And for good measure, we included elastic loops for cables, pens, tools or any other items that you want to transport securely, as well as a hidden interior zipper pocket for items that can't be misplaced.
The reinforced webbing handle provides an easy grip if stored in bags of any size, and provides an easy anchor point if you prefer to attach it to the outside of your bag with a carabiner.
This is the ideal small bag for everyday carry, traveling, and general organization.

Product Information.data: S2 Tool Steel with Black Phosphate coating

Description.data:
All LTT Screwdriver bits are made from S2 tool steel with a black phosphate coating. This type of steel provides a great balance of strength and rigidity - it's strong enough to hold up to daily use in casual and professional settings, and resilient enough to keep up with our ratcheting driver.
The black phosphate coating provides a nice industrial look and improved rust resistance over standard S2 steel.
At 20mm these bits are perfectly sized to fit in the bit clip within the handle of the LTT screwdriver, so whether you're screwing Phillips and Hex all day on the jobsite or disassembling electronics in the shop, you should have whatever you need right at your side.
NOTE: Bits are a consumable item and will wear or break down over time. Visual wear to the black phosphate coating is normal and expected.

Description.data:
From https://jerryrigknife.com/
Made using an Aluminum-Zinc alloy, The JerryRig Knife uses premium materials to ensure it's the perfect weight and size for both your pockets and your hands. The all metal handle is textured with a tessellated hexagon pattern that gives you a confident grip, and the built-in JerryRigEverything belt clip serves as your constant reminder that Life is a DIY project.
The CLEAR knife is made from Polycarbonate, the same stuff they put inside bullet proof glass.
Of course, even the sharpest blade will eventually become dull. When it comes time to replace the razor blade, you've got nothing to worry about. No proprietary sharp edges here - The JerryRig Knife uses standard stainless steel replacement blades that can be found at any hardware store for pennies, and will swap out in seconds.
Whether you're buying one for yourself or for a friend, make sure the owner can be trusted around sharp objects. Remember: The JerryRig Knife doesn't cost an arm and a leg... but it might cost you a finger if you aren't careful.

Description.data:
These towels feature a tasteful, embossed keyboard-inspired design and 100% cotton fabric. We wanted to create a line-up that covered all of your size needs - whether that's in your home, or at the beach.
On our most recent order, we added in a new fabric softening treatment which improves the feel of our towels against your skin. This treatment also improved total water absorption and lowered drying time in our testing. (Please note that Aqua 45x100cm and Orange 45x100cm do not currently include this treatment as those pieces are part of a previous order)
Wash with similar colors to avoid color bleed, especially during first wash.

Description.data:
The long-awaited LTT Backpack has arrived!
We thoughtfully designed the 22 pockets & sleeves for a wide variety of daily uses. This bag can accommodate multiple laptops or tablets, portable game consoles, accessories, and hardware/tools - including a pocket dedicated to the LTT Screwdriver, and a hidden Airtag sleeve near the water bottle sleeve in our vast main storage pocket (we've affectionately called this one the "bag of holding" internally).
All straps & stitches have been reinforced well beyond what an average user would need, including our triple-rivet-reinforced top handle which can hold up to a pull force of 778.6N (175lb or 79kg).
We've aimed for the best possible materials in all aspects. Our main material is a Repreve Polyester with a water-resistant lining which we tested to an AATCC water repellency rating of 80 (spills & light rain will bead on its surface), and - like other materials from Repreve - is made entirely from recycled plastic water bottles. Our zippers are, of course, from the legendary YKK - they're water-resistant across all external pockets & sport custom LTT carabiner-style pulls on all main pockets.
This bag's internal carrying capacity is 25.5L, and the external volume is 35L. That big difference is primarily due to the abundance of padding & reinforcement throughout the bag, including between pockets & below the laptop sleeve, ensuring that your devices should never slide directly onto a hard surface when inserted into a sleeve.
Max laptop size for largest sleeve: 11.25 x 15.5 x 1.25" (28.575 x 39.37 x 3.175cm)
Meets carry-on standards for most airlines (just barely fits under the seat!)
For more info about the bag, check out the variety of photos down below!
Note: There is a known issue that may cause your backpack's zipper pulls to be more fragile than intended. For information,
see here.

Description.data:
At long last, our ratcheting multi-bit screwdriver has arrived.
This is the complete vision of a screwdriver designed for Linus and the whole LTT team. It features a knurled stainless steel shaft with a strong magnet inside, internal storage for 12 "shorty" 20mm bits (or 6 full-sized bits), an in-house designed three-lobe handle for comfort and ergonomics, and a tastefully-embossed LTT logo on the end cap.
The ratchet is based on Megapro's long-standing & reliable design, but has been significantly modified to suit our needs. We reversed the ratchet direction (right for clockwise, left for anti-clockwise), adjusted the spring for lighter back-force which allows you to ratchet-drive even very small screws, and optimized for smoothness and quiet function. It's rated for operation of up to 220 inch-pounds of force.
Our bit storage is another collaboration with Megapro. We utilized their patented bit clip storage design, but adjusted the length of the clips & the size of the total cavity to allow for our smaller, more ergonomic handle.
All external plastics are Triax 1120 - a Nylon and ABS polymer which is great for injection molding parts like ours - for its overall durability and chemical resistance. The only exception is the black "accent ring" on the all black versions, which are made from machined Delrin, and the orange "accent ring" on the black & orange version, which are made from injection molded ABS.
Internal plastics in our ratchet are also made from Delrin for its self-lubricating properties, and our ratchet housing is made from Zinc.
Our industrial-looking black phosphate-coated S2 steel bits are durable and rust resistant.
Standard bit set included with the screwdriver: PH0, PH1, PH2, H2, H2.5, H4, SL2, SL4, SL6, SQ1, SQ2, and our 5x5 Magnet bit (affectionately named "The Screw Retriever")
(This was previously listed as a 6x6 magnet bit, but that was incorrect. The size is 5x5mm)
NOTE: Bits are a consumable item and will wear or break down over time. Visual wear to the black phosphate coating is normal and expected.
Other bit sets are available for purchase at
https://www.lttstore.com/products/bits
Using patents from Megapro Tools Inc.: 5,265,504 & 7,258,046
WARNING: Not compliant with airport security restrictions in some countries (including but not limited to US and Canada). Verify all security/travel restrictions before traveling with your screwdriver!
